title: Girls Like Magic
subTitle: SEASON 1 - ENGLISH
cast: Cast: Shantell Yasmine, Abeydeera, Dominic Adams, Silvia Baldassini
description: Girls like Magic' explores the blurring lines of the friendship between MAGIC, a naive people-pleasing Brit and JAMIE, a hard-edged, self-sabotaging lesbian as they fall for each other in more ways than one.
